channel.title: Need help with Clan Wars
channel.description:
Well i added CW tele ( emote tab ) and all 3 portals work but ... i need help with soething. When i go in zamy portal i tele in zammy start area, but the other team members ( from zamorak team ) can attack me, its not about safezones ... its about an object, or whole armour ( sara for sara and zamy for zamy ) that stop you to attack the other people that are wearing same cape or armour. Plz tell me how to do this
and ... wats Hamachi? i downloaded and i dont know if i should instal it. If someone knows about hamachi plz tell me with wat is helping me

item.title: Need help with Clan Wars
item.dc:creator: @silabmods silabmods
item.description:
@silabmods wrote:

codeusa:

Its called castelwars and Are you the same silabmod who came on my server sayiing you worked for sialb and you where checking servers

hmmm … i dont even know your server ip … and no i didnt camed on your server to check server lol i am trying to make my v1.1 source
stop beliving idiots that say that … lol if id come to any server id come with MadX name not silabmods, or Rabbytt[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 07:19:44 PM[/size][hr]Can someone plz tell me good starting location( coordX and coordY)?
also i need help with adding stores. on my last source i had a store that i could trade with npcid=529 ( i even remember the npc id ), i deleted the already existing store but nothing, i replaced the spwanpoint.cfg ( or wats the name of it ) with the backup i created … but after i relpaced the existing store with mine … nothing it doesnt wants to open it …

Read full topic
